title: React E-Commerce Project
description: E-Commerce project created with React and Firebase. I used libraries like React Spinners, SweetAlert2, and FontAwesome.

title: Movies App React-Native Project
description: This is a mobile application developed with React Native, Firebase, and Expo, which uses the TMDB API for movie search and exploration.

title: Age of Empires 2 Fan Page Project
description: This was my first approach to the world of programming. It is designed in Figma and built with HTML and CSS (Sass).

title: Todo List Project - Frontend Mentor Challenge
description: This is a Todo List project, developed using React with Vite as the bundler and Tailwind CSS as the styling framework. It's a simple app that allows creating, filtering, and deleting tasks. I used @hello-pangea/dnd for drag and drop functionality.

title: Task Forms Project with Descriptions
description: Similar project to the Todo List, with some modifications. It helped me practice for creating the Todo List. Sweet Alert was used to show user feedback on performed actions.

title: JS Project - CD Store
description: This was my second project, created with JS. It simulates a basic CD store, allowing users to add CDs to the shopping cart, calculate the total purchase amount, and search for available CDs. I implemented Sweet Alerts to notify users based on certain interactions.
